Is somebody watching you through your webcam?

Someone could be watching you through your webcam without you even realizing it. We don't mean to unduly alarm you, but unsecured cameras onto your computer could offer a malicious hacker with an immediate window into your life. And when they have watched you for long enough, chances are they'll try their luck blackmailing you with something they have seen.

How do you tell if your camera has been compromised? And what could you do to protect yourself? How can I avoid this happening?

Fortunately, there are ways that you can avoid going through this whole ordeal in the first location. Prevention is better than cure, after all. First things first - install our Webcam Block extension.

- Can someone see you through your laptop camera?
